lxml API
 
[frames] | no frames]
[ Identifiers | Deprecations ]

Deprecation List


Deprecations in lxml.etree.FallbackElementClassLookup.setFallback
  • use set_fallback() instead.
Deprecations in lxml.etree.XPathElementEvaluator.registerNamespace
  • use register_namespace() instead
Deprecations in lxml.etree.XPathElementEvaluator.registerNamespaces
  • use register_namespaces() instead
Deprecations in lxml.etree.XSLT.apply
  • call the object, not this method.
Deprecations in lxml.etree.XSLT.tostring
  • use str(result_tree) instead.
Deprecations in lxml.etree.clearErrorLog
  • use clear_error_log() instead.
Deprecations in lxml.etree.getDefaultParser
  • please use get_default_parser instead.
Deprecations in lxml.etree.setDefaultParser
  • please use set_default_parser instead.
Deprecations in lxml.etree.setElementClassLookup
  • use set_element_class_lookup(lookup) instead
Deprecations in lxml.etree.tounicode
  • use tostring(el, encoding=unicode) instead.
Deprecations in lxml.etree.useGlobalPythonLog
  • use use_global_python_log() instead.
Deprecations in lxml.objectify.setDefaultParser
  • use set_default_parser() instead.
Deprecations in lxml.objectify.setPytypeAttributeTag
  • use set_pytype_attribute_tag() instead.
